thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 10 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Jilin Jian Yisheng Pharmaceutical adopts new accounting policy regarding government subsidy

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jilin Jian Yisheng Pharmaceutical adopts new accounting policy regarding government subsidy

organizations.name: reuters) - jilin jian yisheng pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
Jan 10(Reuters) - Jilin Jian Yisheng Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Says it changes accounting policy based on accounting standards for business enterprises No. 16-government subsidies, which was disclosed by the Ministry of Finance on May 10, 2017, effective June 12, 2017
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/MzTkxR
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
